channel.title: pandora on Og Maciel's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in pandora on Og Maciel's Journal

item.title: Adventures in the Music Streaming World
item.description: These last couple of years have brought (along with some new wrinkles and occasional grey hairs) some interesting changes on how I manage and maintain my “digital belongings”. For a long while I used to worry about backing up and storing in a safe place all the files, photos, books, movies and music I’ve collected through the years. I have also managed to collect a variety of different external USB hard drives to keep up with this digital sprawl, where for each iteration the next device would increase in size and sometimes in speed compared to the current one.

item.title: Life Update: July 15th, 2012
item.description: It’s been a while since I actually blogged or wrote much that wasn’t work related… so here’s a list, in no particular order, of what I have been doing these days for those who were wondering what had happened to me: I have been asked to step into a new role at work, and for the last 2-3 months I have been acting as the team lead (no job title change yet).
